name: Suspicious Ldap Domain Access
description: Detect suspicious ldap request from non Windows application
false_positives: Programs that also lookup the observed domain
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(dns.question.name:_ldap.* AND (NOT ((process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\*) OR (process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND process.executable:*\\MsMpEng.exe) OR (process.executable:<unknown\ process>))))`
